title: Land for sale in Battaramulla ( With House )
details:
* 24.5 perches land with two story house, selling for land value, land facing newly building jogging track, 20 feet access road, 500 meters to battaramulla town.

* 2.6 million per perch, selling for highest offer.

* Inspection only through Appointment! Brokers will not be entertained!
